items.sentence: Tom isn\'t the kind of man who would do that kind of thing.
Tom didn\'t want to eat and Mary couldn\'t persuade him to.
Tom doesn\'t know how much time it\'ll take him to do that.
I\'ve always wanted to be a professional basketball player.
I\'ve heard that Boston is a dangerous place. Is that true?
I\'ve learned a lot of French by watching movies in French.
If you want me to wear those boots, I\'ll wear those boots.
There are many countries in Europe that I\'d like to visit.
Tom couldn\'t think what he should give Mary for Christmas.
Tom decided that it wasn\'t necessary to paint the ceiling.
